title: Leavebuster Problem - didn't leave, still "busted"
body:
Ok, so there's a new, slightly contraversial, leavebuster system. Yeah it is a bit harsh, and yeah it is a bit condescending BUT that's not its main problem.  I have found myself being "busted" despite not having left a game. 

In one game, I had about 1fps so I restarted my computer. Back after 5 minutes - we won the game. Then I had to type "I agree" in that notoriously patronising jail cell of a textbox. 

In another game, following the recent patch, (patches always scare me, you never know when you'll have to reinstall the entire game), the game just randomly crashed and, despite reconnecting, I was "busted" again.

I know that, technically, this means I've not been playing for a short period of time. But surely there's no need to bust someone if they come back, or were simply trying to fix the problems that you created. I find afks and ragequitters as frustrating as the next person, but I feel this new system is far too harsh considering it's not all that accurate.

replies.body: Should be raised to fifteen minutes of inactivity. Five is just crazy, that's the usual boot time of a computer.
